pageContent: Objective: To assess the cost-effectiveness of two diagnostic strategies for prostate cancer in men with prostate-specific antigen (PSA) levels of 4-10 ng/ml and normal digital rectal examination (DRE).

metaData.source:
Focal High-intensity Focused Ultrasound Targeted Hemiablation for Unilateral Prostate Cancer: A Prospective Evaluation of Oncologic and Functional Outcomes
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26164416/
